title: fking bots
body:
HEY shitty riot how about you finally add a report catagory 4 botting? 2years now nothing has happend, i think i will start botting myself now because why should i play myself? it's every aram 3-5 bots, no fun at all

Gj on your work, HEY ATLEAST WE GET FKING SkiNS!!!11 yeay
